mergeMojo

public static void mergeMojo(org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom mojo,
                             org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom superMojo)
Merges a mojo descriptor with its super-mojo (inherit from it) The local mojo is considered the dominant one - if any parameters, configuration or requirements match then the local version is kept. Any parameters, configuration or requirements not in the local mojo are appended to its descriptor

Parameters:
mojo - local mojo inheriting from superMojo
superMojo - mojo being extended

write

public void write()
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes the plugin metadata back to the file where it was loaded from

Throws:
java.io.IOException
